text: Marko Podraščanin () (born 29 August 1987) is a Serbian volleyball player, a member of Serbia men's national volleyball team and Italian club Sir Safety Umbria Perugia. He has participated in two Olympic Games (Beijing 2008, London 2012), and is a bronze medalist of the World Championship 2010. ==References== * FIVB profile 2012 Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian volleyball players Category:Sportsmen Category:Olympians for Serbia
title: Marko Podraščanin
